name: psychic
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.
flavor_text.emerald: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A strong telekinetic attack. It may also lower the foe’s SP. DEF stat.
